title: Simplify
text: Simplify the equation so that there is a single digit on each side of the inequality symbol.

title: Interpret
text: The equation in this case simplifies to $$-1>-5$$, which is a true statement. Therefore, $$(-4,-1)$$ is a solution to the inequality.
